com.example.androideye
Class RecognizerTask.AudioTask

java.lang.Object
  com.example.androideye.RecognizerTask.AudioTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
RecognizerTask
 class RecognizerTask.AudioTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Audio recording task. This class implements a task which pulls blocks of audio from the system audio input and places them on a queue.

Author:
David Huggins-Daines
